flawed_nl_solution:
The movie theater made 5 * 32 = $<<5*32=160>>160 in matinee tickets.
It made 7 * 40 = $<<7*40=280>>280 in evening tickets.
It made 10 * 58 = $<<10*58=580>>580 in opening night tickets.
There were 32 + 40 + 58 = <<32+40+58=310>>310 customers.
Half of the customers bought popcorn, so 310 / 2 = <<310/2=155>>155 bought popcorn.
Thus, the theater made 10 * 155 = $<<10*155=1550>>1550 from popcorn.
Therefore, in all, the theater made 160 + 280 + 580 + 1550 = $<<160+280+580+1550=2570>>2570 on Friday night.
#### 2570

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 310. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
